'''Borderland Catalyst Billet''' is a [[Forging Material]] used in [[forging]] 4-Star [[catalysts]] of the [[Salutary Series]].

==Alchemy==
{{Recipe
|type = Converting
|Northlander Catalyst Billet = 1
|Dream Solvent = 2

}}

}}
